name: In Two: Demo
description:
Description:

You wake up in the dark room, being surrounded and pinned down to the ground by cultists. They start to perform a ritual on you, but suddenly, the ritual has been interrupted. Thanks to this, you can now split your soul from the body! Use your new ability wisely to escape from the cultists base, before you will meet a terrible demise.

Idea by Pixel224444 & Brudda

Programmed by Brudda 

Graphics by Pixel224444

Check at liluo.io: https://brudda.itch.io/in-two
